item.title: I don't understand why she left me for this dude!@
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:29, topic:366156”][quote author=`Aaron link=topic=462355.msg3382530#msg3382530 date=1288153118]
Looks aren’t everything, and this just proves it bro. I have had the same thing happen to me and it’s very sad, i am sorry to hear about this happening to you, when this happened to me it’s heartbreaking, i was just devastated, my heart was split into four pieces, slowly and slowly my friends helped me realize there are more fish inside the sea.
[/quote]

Yeah I learned the same thing, your way too.

That’s why i’m staying away from school love, i’ll wait till it’s done for all I care.[/quote]

That’s what i have been doing lately, it’s no girls at school anymore for me.

item.title: I don't understand why she left me for this dude!@
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:13, topic:366156”]Let me try to explain some shit to you. 3 things are happening here

The guy is first off into drugs, so that makes him better then you to start with.

Second who gives a fuck? Its just a girl tap and leave.

Third she looks like someone from a porno movie so, odds are she had sex way before you, and if you didn’t give her any then there was your problem.(I know you will say you did, even if you didn’t)[/quote]

Oh well she’s not worth it, if they’re on drugs they’ll end up living in a trailer with a horrible job.

Just find a better woman, that’s all
